inn1.comm: swing first up, a very full ball outside off, a full toss in fact, but Tharanga cannot time it well at all
much wider, seaming away, wide called and thats the first run

full outside off and Tharanga drives at it loosely with no footwork, getting an inside edge wide of square leg to get off the mark, out at fine leg Yuvraj runs around and tries to flick the ball back and it is reviewed to see if he made any contact with ropes, replays show he did not so Tharanga gets three
cracks his first ball off the middle of the bat but Sehwag at short cover gets a hand to it and saves runs, that was well struck by Dilshan off the front foot
wide, down the pads, no contact and Karthik collects
another poor ball down the pads
full outside off and he cracks it between the covers before anyone could move
full on middle and off, straightens after pitching, defended
terrible ball, down the pads and all Dilshan needs to do it get a faint tickle on it and the result is four more
good start, pitches it up and gets some shape, Tharanga feels for it off the front foot and edges safely along the carpet down to third man
hah, take that! Dilshan just gets forward to a fullish ball on the stumps, rolls the wrists, and smacks that in the air wide of Tharanga for four, top shot from him
replies with a wider ball outside off which Dilshan flays up and over point for four more, not a great shot at all but he's gone at it hard and the result is good
good shot again, this one hits a length outside off and he frees the arms, hitting it very hard, Raina at short cover dives to his right and takes some pace off the ball but cannot prevent four
better ball, hits the upright seam on a length, Dilshan stands there and opens the face of the bat to defend it down to point
goes for a length ball very hard, too much bottom hand and not enough footwork, and ends up playing it back to Sharma in his followthrough
ah, unlucky for Zaheer! He pitches it up and gets some shape, a rooted Tharanga chases it and gets an inside edge down to fine leg in a hurry
veers wider outside off and gets Tharanga playing away from the body, turning the bat face and playing to backward point
flash and a miss to a wider ball outside off, reaches out and flirts with it, a wide is called by the umpire which Zaheer doesn't agree with
full on the stumps, bit of movement, Tharanga tries to on-drive but gets another inside edge onto his bats and then drops near his feet
well bowled, again a good area to bowl on the stumps and Tharanga just defends
too straight and he rolls the wrists, picks the gap at square leg, they run hard and get three
strays onto Dilshan's pads and he glances it for four
nice shot, punched on the rise but straight to mid-off
ah, great shot! Not a lot of footwork but Tharanga gets under a length ball and plays a lovely high-elbow, on-the-rise shot over long-off for six
slower ball, short of a length and angling across, Tharanga kneels down and doesn't offer a shot, Karthik gets some bad bounce and cannot collect cleanly
hammered! Dilshan sees room and just flays bat on ball, hitting uppishly toward mid-off where Harbhajan dives but cannot stop it, and the fifty is up in a flash
ha ha ha, what fun! Slow bouncer, sits up and Dilshan slaps a pull shot past midwicket

man oh man, whats happening! Dilshan has had enough of brute force and decides to pull out his vintage shot, the paddle shot, and pulls it off superbly over short fine leg for four more to end a horrific second over for Ishant
full outside off, opens the face and runs it down toward gully
good shot, pushes it to short cover, straight to Sehwag who releases in a jiffy and hits the other side but Dilshan has got back in time, good stuff from Sehwag
DOT BALL! Nehra isn't hitting any mean pace but he hits the seam and gets Tharanga to defend to Sehwag at short cover
has a charge, making room, but connects with nuttin' but air
straighter ball, awkwardly tapped in front of mid-on and sets off for a sharp single

oh man, what is going on out there! Suicidal run attempted by Dilshan, just like Pietersen in Centurion yesterday, gets over a shortish ball and cracks it to cover and sets off without looking at Tharanga, Gambhir swoops in and collects and has all the time to hit down the stumps with Dilshan harrying off nearly halfway down the track, but Gambhir misses the stumps, Karthik has to run in front of the sticks to collect, then back-flips it but goes over the stumps! He had plenty of time to collect and hit the stumps but he flipped it back and missed by a mile and Dilshan has been let off, shocker from Karthik
full on the stumps, worked away for one
short of a length and driven off the inside edge to covers
single to extra cover off the back foot, well run
pitches it up, Tharanga drives with an inside edge to midwicket
down the pads, Tharanga is early in the attempted nudge and the ball pops back up drops well in front of Zaheer
and again, Tharanga doesn't time a push well, and the ball balloons up between cover and point
short of a length, punched nicely by Dilshan into the covers, Raina slides but cannot pull it in and thats four more

whew, relief for India and the crowd explodes! Nehra drags it short, Dilshan harries out and goes for a pull, its too short and he gets a top edge off the shoulder of the bat and Karthik runs back to hold it, had he dropped that ... ummm ....
down the pads and he nudges it away for a single
hits a good length on middle and off and Sanga defends
straightens after pitching, Sangakkara tries to nurdle it but adjusts and defends it back down the track
good ball again, a bit fuller, Sangakkara gets over it and pushes to cover, setting off in a hurry
too straight and he clips it out to the man on the ropes
gets him onto the front foot, running the ball down to gully
strays down the pads and Tharanga turns it in the air wide of Tendulkar at midwicket and gets a couple
hits a length just outside off and Tharanga pats it back
well played, just gets a bit of room outside off and steers it between point and third man for four, nobody can cut that off
goes back to that good length on middle and leg, straightens it, and Tharanga pushes it back
good length outside off and Sanga runs it down to third man
nice ball, cuts in off a shorter length and cramps Tharanga who punches to Raina in the off side
a bit too straight, even it it does cramps him, and Tharanga nudges it toward midwicket where Tendulkar runs after it and does well to yank it back
too wide and Tharanga cuts very hard into the off side for four
pitches it fuller and it stays low, Tharanga feels for it without any footwork and inside-edges into the off side
down the leg side and turned off the hips but Zaheer is lurking at short fine leg
bad ball, down the pads and he turns it out to the sweeper

ah, another loose shot from Tharanga! The lack of foot work nearly does for him, as he pushes at a length ball that stops on him, hits in the air toward mid-off but it drops in front of Harbhajan and to his right side
slides into the pads and he clips it to midwicket
nice shape but the line is too straight and Sangakkara presents a full face of the bat, pushing back straight past  the stumps for a single
on a length on the stumps and he dabs it to midwicket and sets off
fuller outside off, drives at it hard and ends up turning it toward mid-on
short of a length, dabbed to backward point, looks up briefly at Tharanga who nods and they scamper a single, that is good running and coordination
tries to get over a short ball outside off and doesn't time it well, dragging it down to mid-on who runs in to collect
gets another short ball and pulls it uneasily into the gap at midwicket, Harbhajan covers ground in the deep and returns the ball in a hurry
goes after a full and wide ball and angles it down to third man
opens the face and runs the ball out to third man for one more
good ball, pitched up and he gets over it to try and work it away but falls over and has to push it back to Nehra
pitches it up on the stumps, Tharanga drives hard and too early and plays it back to the bowler
super shot, just gets a wee bit of room and hits it nicely into the gap past a diving short cover and chasing point fielder and gets four, not hit hard but timed it well
pitches it up, Tharanga gets over the ball and runs it to third man

comes onto the front foot and pushes the ball to extra cover, calling early, Raina gets a hand to it but fumbles it down the ground, Harbhajan, who has run after it, has to change his angle and go the other way and in that time Sanga gets a second run
overpitched and that is nothing more than a defensive push, but its timed to perfection and hit dead straight to get four that raises Sri Lanka's 100
ah, well played Sanga! Slower ball, floated up outside off, he kneels down, opens the face, and just glides that between point and cover, agonizingly perfect
another open-faced steer down to third man
length ball, Sangakkara gets back, gently taps it to backward point, and gets one
back of a length, cramps him, Tharanga stands there and pushes to cover
cramps him again with the angle, Tharanga once more dabs it to cover and sets off, but gets shooed back as Nehra runs across and collects the ball
poor ball down the pads, glanced down to fine leg
short of a length outside off, in a flash he chops it to third man
flat on the stumps, played back to Harbhajan
steers it down the pads, nicely tucked down to fine leg for two
slower ball, tossed up on middle and leg, he waits for turn and then dabs it toward midwicket and sets off, that is well played and well run
tossed up on off stump this time and Tharanga is early into the shot
slightly shorter, he gets back and tries to pierce the off-side cordon for four and cracks it nicely but not into the gap
tossed up this time and he pats it back watchfully
on the pads, worked away nicely out to the sweeper
room outside off stump, hit out to the deep, Ishant runs across from third man and pulls off a sliding stop to save two, and up comes the fifty partnership
back of a length just outside off and he guides it to backward point
punched off the back foot nicely into the gap at point, again Ishant has room to cover and pulls it off near the ropes, releasing the ball in a flash
slow bouncer, Sangakkar ducks under it, wide is the call for height
again steered out to Ishant at third man, keeping him busy
nicely played, just saw a bit of room and angled the bat on ball and picked the gap at cover point and the ball sped away, nothing more than a defensive push
flat on the stumps, Sanga goes back and pushes it back
a bit too short and he cuts it out to deep point for a single
pushed through quicker on the pads, nudged away to square leg to raise his fifty
slower and wider, he reaches out and slices a single past point
even wider and Tharanga cracks it square on the side, backward point dives and saves four, well stopped
slower through the air, dips and gets some turn outside off, Sangakkara pushes at it and gets a genuine outer edge that runs away to the boundary
tosses it up and he drives the ball to extra cover
flatter ball, goes back and drives toward mid-on
well flighted wide of the stumps, Tharanga has a chase and slaps it toward backward point
slower ball, middle and off, Sangakkar has to pat it back
a little bit shorter and he pushes off the back foot toward cover
some turn, Tharanga makes room and steers the ball away
tossed up on a length outside off, he waits on the back foot and then cuts hard into the off side cordon
slower ball, some turn, gets Tharanga onto the front foot and slicing square on the of side toward cover
quicker ball, much fuller and flatter, nearly a yorker, Tharanga makes room and then has to adjust and jam the bat down
shorter in length and he steers it off the back foot for a single
quicker ball on a length, no turn, pushed into the off side
flighted outside off to get Sangakkra driving on the rise to cover, Raina there misfields it and allows the run, Kohli runs from the deep and mops up
short and wide and punched into the off side
slower on middle and off, stabbed at and inside-edges to midwicket
comes forward and drives to cover
skips out and hits with the turn, a lovely drive over the top for six
gets over the ball and steals a single
tossed up on off stump, Tharanga pushes it to cover for one more
flat on middle and leg, not much turn, defended to the on side
turns from middle and off, he pushes it to cover for a single
comes on from a shorter length and he rocks over it to cut hard
tossed up to get him driving off the front foot, picks the gap at cover and that is the 150 up
still too short, he gets back and angles the ball toward gully
drifts down the line, he starts to nudge it away but the extra bounce makes him adjust and push back down to Harbhajan, well bowled
goes back and pushes it down toward mi-on
breaks away from middle and off, Tharanga doesn't get over it but just pushes it past extra cover, Nehra in the deep misfields and gets Tharanga back on strike
shorter ball, hops back and flashes hard, Zaheer fields at short third
again Tharanga goes back to punch it down the ground for one
tossed up, gets some turn, Sangakkara hangs on the back foot and angles the bat, turning the ball across the line for one more
pushes it through, Tharanga goes back and chops down to third man
flat on leg stump, he shuffles and glances it, Nehra has to cover a lot of ground and Tharanga gets an easy couple
flighted outside off, square-driven to Jadeja at backward point
slower ball, some overspin, patted back to Harbhajan
tossed up slowly again, some turn, Tharanga gets over the ball and nudges it to point, stumbles off the blocks but Sangakkara sends him back as Jadeja advances
uses his feet and on-drives a single down the ground this time
slows the pace, lands it on a length, driven back to Harbhajan
bad ball, short outside off and he crunches it into the gap for four
fuller on middle and leg, stabs at it and pushes it down the ground for one

stumped, on the second attempt! Sangakkara dances down the track and looks to whip it against the turn, he's beaten in the air and the ball breaks away off the track, Karthik fumbles the collection but regroups to break the stumps on the second attempt, take that blooming baseball grill off, man
tossed up and he pulls out that trademark dead-bat defensive

exaggerated appeal from Sehwag as Jayawardene gets his front foot across to try and work the ball away, there's a wee bit of turn and the ball hits the pad, Sehwag sets off in animated appeal even as the umpire shakes his head, enough doubt in the mind as it hit him in line but the ball was probably doing too much down the leg stump, and he had got a ways across
gets over it and plays it away, MJ wants one but is denied
outside off and driven to Raina at extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, worked away to the on side
faster ball, quicker turn, cuts back in a long way to Jayawardene who attempts a brave cut and just manages to chop in down into the off side, dangerous
slower ball, plenty of drift, plays it back
spins in too much, wide called
slides down the pads, brushed away to the leg side
slow through the air, well bowled, gets Jayawardene stretching forward to defend and the result is an inside edge to the leg side
outside off, plenty of turn, steered down to third man

tossed up, he attempts the paddle sweep, gets a top edge, Karthik turns and sets off and dives but cannot get a hold, it was always going away from him and he was struggling, puts in a massive dive but fails to latch on, well attempted
arm ball, comes forward and defends

bowled em! Well done Jadeja, tosses it up on a length outside off stump, Tharanga drives at the ball against the spin with a massive gap between bat and pad, the ball pitches and turns in a long, long way and hits off stump
tossed up wide again, Kandamby gets across and works it away to the leg side
slowly flighted up and MJ patiently pats it back
flighted outside off, he reaches out and plays against the turn, pushing to cover
gets over a short ball and forces it square on the off side
back to slower, gets him defending off the front foot
well tossed up, Kandamby turns it nicely out in front of his pad, picking the gap at midwicket
flights it, Jayawardene pushes at it with a long stride in and inside-edges to the leg side, that is well bowled
short ball gets a wicket! Harbhajan drags it down, Jayawardene goes for a pull but hits it straight to a leaping Raina at midwicket, and he cannot believe it
tossed up on off stump and he defends
again, comes forward and defends
well done, opens the face and guides it toward Zaheer at short third
well done, tossed up, gets some turn, defended to cover
moves forward to defend, gets rapped on the pads a long way down, Jadeja appeals and keeps on appealing in vain
flatter ball, defended back
tossed up to get him defending off the front foot
well done, tossed up on a length just outside off, some turn, Kandamby is again forced to defend
this time he plants forward and cocks the wrists, manufacturing a single down the ground
spins down, he plays it off the pads, toward square leg, Karthik reacts and saves runs
tossed up and defended
gently floated up, Kapugedera uses his feet and tries to drive, hits it decently enough to get a single down the ground
comes out and defends it back as the ball spins down leg
flatter and shorter, Kapugedera punches it off the back foot
gets across to outside off stump and pushes it to mid-on
again Kandamby moves across and clips the ball down the ground

ah, well done, sees him moving down and pulls it back, Kapugedera has to defend after being beaten in flight and the turn draws an outer edge wide of slip, Ishant runs across and dives at third man and does well to save four
slower still, loopy delivery, he defends and the ball balloons up off the pad
drifts down the pads, Kapugedera glances, Jadeja covers a lot of ground and does well in the deep
tossed up, defended off the front foot to the off side
straighter ball, worked with the turn to square leg, Karthik runs after it and collides with Tendulkar running in
faster ball, a touch shorter, gets some bounce, pushed to cover
fuller ball, turned from outside off out to square leg
slower ball on a length outside off, he waits and then drives off the front foot into the covers
flighted, no turn, punched off the back foot down to long-off
well played, its a wider ball and he opens the face to glide to third man, raising the first four in eight overs
hops across to outside off, pushes it down to mid-on
slower ball, tossed up wider, he pushes at it and steers to short third
tossed up on off stump, Kapugedera defends with bat and pad together
straighter ball and Kapugedera bunts it to long-on for one
back of length, straightening outside off stump, poked away to point region
length delivery outside off stump, mistimed drive towards cover where Jadeja swoops on the ball and misses the stumps at the non-striker's end
leans forward to defend the length delivery to the off side
really fullish, on the off and middle stump line, hint of movement, squeezed out to point
length delivery around the off stump line, moving away, pushed out to point
around the off stump line, straightening a bit, squeezed out to cover point
on the middle stump line, turns away, driven down to long-off
loverly hit. He picked this one from outside off, lunged forward, and swept it over midwicket boundary
on drives this one to right of midwicket where it has been stopped
on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
turns in to the middle, worked to square-leg
on the leg stump line, slightly slower in pace, turned to midwicket region
good ball, on a length, on the upright seam, no room on offer and Kapugedera defends it back
short of a length on the stumps and Kapugedera hops up, rolling the wrists to play the bounce and keep it down in front of the man at midwicket
good stuff, hits a nice tidy line and with it some shape, Kapugedera gets forward and pushes the ball to cover
keeps up the momentum, pitching it up and Kapugedera defends
holds back the length outside off and Kapugedera chases it, steering it streakily down to third man
opens the face and angles a length ball down to third man
tossed up, Kandamby gets well forward and turns the ball away
flatter delivery spins down the pads and he brushes it to square leg
dragged on! A nothing dismissal, as Kapudegera goes back and chases the ball away from his body and chops it back onto his sticks
slowly flighted on the stumps and he gets forward to defend
on the stumps, bit of turn, Kulasekara defends again
works the ball off his pads to open his account
hits a length just outside off and Kulasekara defends to cover
on the stumps, hint of shape, and he defends it back
short on the body, he hops and works the ball down to fine leg
gets some room and chases it hard, edging down to third man

bowled em! Ishant continues his very good spell by keeping it full and straight to Kandamby who presses forward on the defensive and gets an inside edge as the ball straightens a wee bit after pitching, the top off off stump goes back and Ishant is absolutely loving it

edged and gone! Two in two for Ishant and its because of that fuller length and the bit of movement it produces! This one is again pitched up to Randiv who pushes at it off the front foot and gets the faintest of edges through to Karthik
keeps it full and straight, Kula presses forward and defends
strays onto the pads and is worked away for an easy single
flat outside off, Malinga lets it go
gets closer to the stumps this time, Malinga defends to cover
it turns and bounces, misses both the edge and the off stump, pitches middle and off, and turns away, and Malinga has no clue about that
flighted more this time, and defended off the front foot
back of a length, but into his pads, and he flicks it away nonchalantly
smacked! Just errs in length and Kulasekara pulls the half-tracker between square leg and short midwicket
back to a good length and he defends watchfully
and again, he prospers with that good length and the movement, with Kulasekara presenting a full face of the bat in defense
takes the outer edge with the upright seam, as Kulasekara pushes at one on the top of off stump and watches the ball fly down to third man
pushed tentatively off the front foot straight to point

that is plumb! Jadeja continues to plug away from around the stumps, pushing in an arm ball that slides on and hits Kulasekara in front of middle and leg as the bat comes down late on the attempted defensive shot back down the track
full on middle and off, speared in, and Mendis plays it out
slower ball, drifts in, Mendis punches down the track
again watchfully played back by Mendis to Jadeja
well flighted, gets some drift to Mendis who stabs at it end inside-edges to the on side
good angle, some turn, watchfully patted back
good ball, hits a length and leaves Mendis who plays and misses
forces him to play again and the ball is squeezed to third man
swing and a miss from Malinga, having a go and done in by the lack of bounce
short of a length on the stumps and he defends it back
short and wide and he flashes it down over backward point
good length on the stumps, straightens after pitching, watchfully patted back
tossed up, gets drift, Mendis pushes it back
goes for a cut and misses out
that is too short so Mendis hits it out to the man at deep point
slower ball, good dip, gets him to defend with soft hands and the edge rolls to backward point
drifts down the pads, he's late on the shot and the ball rolls fie
now outside off and he pushes straight to cover
full and it gets him defending to the off side
short of a length, Mendis hangs on the back foot and squirts the ball into the gap behind point, calls Malinga back for the second and they get it comfortably
hits a length and Mendis defends, the ball rolls into the space at cover and point and the result is a quick single
slides down the pads, Malinga attempts a flick but gets a leading edge into the ground well in front of cover and point
short, aimed at the body, he hops up and works the ball to midwicket
attempts the yorker but its a low full toss that is patted down to mid-off, they run, the fielder nails the stumps with a direct hit but all is well for Sri Lanka as Mendis hurries back to his crease
tossed up on the stumps and he defends it back
good shot, gooood shot! Malinga gets under a tossed up delivery and even without much footwork just goes through with the lofted shot and goes over mid-on
flatter ball, he gets back and pushes it back to Jadeja
turns the ball toward short fine leg and scampers away
flatter, shorter ball outside off, Mendis punches to cover
lovely way to end his spell! Slows the pace, tosses it up just outside the line, gets a little bit of turn back in but its enough to slide past the bat and hit off stump
tossed up on middle and off, some turn, defended to slip
slower ball, pitches in line, pushed back
outside leg stump, turned away in the air past square leg
tossed up, he comes forward and pats it back watchfully
shorter in length, well outside off, spins in a long way as Welegedara shuffles across and attempts a tickle, struck down the line
gets a single, again shuffling and this time picking the gap
pitches it on the stumps, Welegedara pushes it to cover
that is that! Nehra goes full just outside off stump, Malinga stands there and swings and inside-edges onto the base of his stumps

inn2.comm: starts off full just outside leg stump, Sehwag swings and misses and they all go up in appeal
now he gets Sehwag to play and miss, almost a replay of the one that dismissed him in Nagpur, the difference being that the ball did not stay up as much as it angled by
hits a length on the stumps and shapes it back in, Sehwag is hurried into the shot and adjusts to play it back
chases a half-volley outside off and inside-edges back past leg stump
fuller and wider, he goes fishing but the lack of carry beats him again
beaten! Good ball to end a maiden over, as Welegedara hits a lovely length and makes Sehwag play, he pushes down the wrong line and narrowly misses edging
on the stumps, worked straight to midwicket, nice wristy shot
ah, slides down and raps the pads as Tendulkar tries to work it past midwicket, looks like it is doing too much off the seam and that saves Tendulkar
top shot, just a clip of the wrists to a fuller one on middle and leg and that is away between two fielders for four
gets back and forces a shorter ball to the off side
fuller this time, Tendulkar is hurried into a drive and inside-edges to midwicket, an alert Sehwag responds to the call
on the stumps, stays low, he defends to the leg side where short midwicket cannot cut if off and gets off the mark
clips again, a bit uppish, but on the bounce to square leg
good ball, hits a fuller length to commit Tendulkar on the front foot, then the ball moves and he plays an uppish drive to cover
again, a lovely flick with the swing but cannot beat square leg
back of a length and Tendulkar gets back into position, pushing the ball past Welegedara and to mid-off who runs across
classical drive through extra cover, just leaning in with a full stride and punching the generous ball away for four
drives again off the front foot to one that straightens after pitching and ends up rolling it toward a diving midwicket fielder
on leg and he just turns it past square leg, letting the speedy outfield take care of the rest, and the running sweeper cannot cut it off
shorter in length, he stands tall and forces it to point
goes back to another short-of-a-length delivery and rolls the wrists, getting deep midwicket into play
too fine and he twirls those rubbery wrists, with fine leg up, and gets four more
ah, good shot! Overpitched on the stumps and Sehwag drills it back very straight and past mid-on for another boundary
slow bouncer, forcing Sehwag to duck as it goes past
hits a good length, Tendulkar pushes it back to Welegedara
outside leg, just a touch of shape, gets up and works it to midwicket
drags back the length and the angle and bounces forces him into an aerial steer but its played into the big gap behind gully
beaten! Good ball, the gentle cutter, it shapes away off an angle and leaves Sehwag who starts to push at it with tentative foot movement
now he goes short and Sehwag ducks as it goes by
cramps him for room, angles back in from outside the line but he goes for a cut and chops it down past the man at backward point
pitches fractionally back of a length outside off, Sehwag gets nice and tall and forces the ball behind point for four, excellent shot
gets a wider ball and steers hard to Dilshan who intercepts at point
short of a length, Sehwag gets up on one leg and flat-bats it down past the nonstriker, mid-on dives and gets a hand to slow the pace of that good shot
dismissed! Malinga drops short and Sehwag smacks that off the back foot over midwicket with power
wide down the pads, no contact on bat, Sanga collects
shot! Not a bad ball, perhaps a bit full, and Sehwag stands there and rolls the wrists, hitting the ball in the air superbly between midwicket and mid-on
goes for the yorker and nearly pulls it off, but Sehwag is in such good touch that he flicks it away out to deep square leg
too straight and he clips it wide of square leg with ease
pushed for four more! Welegedara drops short of a length and Sehwag opens the face to guide the ball in the air square on the off side past a diving Dilshan
overpitched in the slot and Sehwag puts that away past extra cover
now he skips down, heaving and missing a short ball, Sangakkara collects and lets out a late, loud and rather unconvincing appeal, but relays show nothing
oh my lord, what a shot! Welegedara pitches it up on middle and off and Sehwag counters the movement with a stunning smash back that nearly decapitates the umpire
well held, Dilshan! Sehwag absolutely smashes a short ball in the air to backward point where Dilshan cups it, fumbles, and then grasps it off his chest
goes for a full length outside off, Tendulkar reaches out and steers it to gully
slides down the pads, his stock delivery, Tendulkar hops and tries to clip it but gets rapped on the legs
slower ball, he's on the front foot and opens the face to run a single down to third man
comes onto the front foot and pushes at the ball, picking out cover
again onto the front foot early, pushing on the rise, Tharanga at mid-off does the fielding
hits a good length and aims to shape it away from Gambhir, who comes out of his crease and firmly defends it back
pitches it up and gets some shape to Tendulkar who is early in to the drive and inside-edges to midwicket
slower ball, he is again committed on the front foot, looking to drive on the rise, and has to adjust to open the face and play it toward backward point
short outside off, he chops it just wide of Dilshan at backward point
full outside off, comes onto the front foot and drives to mid-off
slides in and he clips it off his pads out to the sweeper
good length, straightens, gets back and defends it back
on leg stump and flicked just past midwicket, the sweeper collects
short of a length, stands tall and plays a chop back to Kulasekara
lured into a slower ball outside off, plays it it with a loose hand and chops it down to fine leg, very fortunate for Tendulkar and unfortunate for Kulasekara
hits a good length and shapes in, Tendulkar pushes it back
again on a good length and he defends it back to Kulasekara
just a bit fuller and he pushes, inside-edging past square leg
full outside leg stump, flicks and misses, scampers a leg bye
continues to struggle for timing, reaching out to a length ball and dragging it into the ground, Gambhir just isn't to the pitch of it
full on middle and off and he finds the gap at midwicket, a shot he plays with ease, even though he clips across the line he plays it well
drives it to mid-on
opens the face and steers the ball down to third man
good shot, just pushes it off the front foot with perfect balance and picks out the window at cover
drives off the front foot, away from the body, and between cover-point
pitches on a length, Tendulkar steers it just wide of point
fuller in length, square-driven to Dilshan on the off side
gets some room outside off but fails to connect well, instead dragging the ball down into the off side in front of point
fuller on leg stump and he on-drives neatly
cramped for room but angles the bat and chops down to third man
flighted on the stumps and he drives to the on side for one
ah, googly, on the stumps and clipped in the air past midwicket
too fine and he plays a good glance down to fine leg where Kulasekara pulls off a very good save
tossed up wide of off stump and Gambhir reaches out, checking the shot to push the ball into the gap on the off side
gently floated up outside off and he carves a square-drive to sweeper
slides down the pads, a slower one it is, and Tendulkar mistimes the attempted nudge off his pads
good ball, stump-to-stump stuff from Kulasekara and Gambhir defends
angles across and he chops a cramped shot toward gully
hits a good length on off stump and straightens the ball, Tendulkar gets across and works the ball nicely to midwicket
fuller and he rolls the wrists, Jayawardene dives and saves runs
well bowled, goes fuller and shapes it away from Tendulkar who gets an outer edge down to third man
good length just around off stump and Gambhir plays it back
well down the pads, he goes for a sweep and gets a faint tickle
lovely shot, just picks the flighted offbreak outside off and drives past extra cover
again floated down leg stump, Tendulkar plays a sweep and misses
laps the ball down past short fine, a running Malinga slides and misfields
spins down the pads, plays a very delicate glance this time
floated up outside off, Gambhir uses his feet and drives to extra cover
takes a full toss and pushes it straight to cover
uses his feet and pushes the ball to mid-off
on the pads and turned to fine leg for a single
flirts with one outside off, looking to uppercut, but misses
well look at that, this time he pulls off the intentional uppercut but it was so very close to the body, he arcs his back and runs it off the face over Sangakkara
fuller in length and he hurries to defend it back to Kulasekara
slower ball slides in, still Kulasekara persists with his stock delivery, and Tendulkar turns it out to the leg-side sweeper, easy as can be
tossed up just outside off and Tendulkar whips it to deep midwicket
tossed up around off stump and Gambhir defends
pushes it into the rough, some drift, runs it to backward point
a tad shorter and he cuts a cramped shot to backward point again
drifts down leg stump, Gambhir pokes the ball to midwicket
easy for Gambhir to go back and push the short ball away for one
tossed up outside off, he opens the face and steers
drifts onto the pads and he works it away
short outside off and he cuts it to backward point
slightly fuller ball, he makes room and drives inside out to cover
comes onto the front foot, waits, and steers the ball to point
uses his feet and drives inside-out through the off side for four
gives it some air and finds some turn back in from outside off, Tendulkar gets into position and defends it back
now he comes out and across to counter the spin and clips it away
flatter ball, slides down the pads, he angles the bat and works it fine
too short and so Tendulkar cuts out to the deep cover sweeper
slowly tossed up on the pads, worked to the leg side
tossed up on a length, he goes back and bunts past midwicket
tossed up and he again goes across and turns it out to the sweeper
floated up on leg stump, Gambhir turns the face and glances very fine
goes back and opens the face, steering the ball off the bat
gets room and cuts again but picks out Kapugedera at point
again he forces it off the back foot and picks out the fielder
googly on the pads and turned out to the fine leg fielder
hits a good length and gets Gambhir flirting and missing outside off
fuller outside off, angles in, he opens the face and runs it to point
gets his back leg across and drives the ball to cover
similar approach, makes sure to cover off stump before opening the face and pushing the ball to the off side cordon
again he plays that cut shot to a fuller ball that stays low and beats him
hops up and turns the ball off his stumps for a single
pushes it in quick and turns it in, Gambhir hurries to run it to point
slowly tossed up on leg stump, no turn, Gambhir looks to play fine and the ball balloons up to short leg, Gambhir shows his bat, and replays show there was no contact

oh well held, Randiv! Another slow loopy delivery on leg stump and Gambhir looks to again turn it away, this time there is some turn and he gets a leading edge that pops up and starts to die but Randiv scampers forward and dives forward to pluck it an inch off the grass ... Gambhir is not convinced and waits for replays which show the bowler did indeed take a really good catch in his followthrough
tossed up outside off, some turn and bounce, awkwardly defended
fuller ball, defended
tossed up and defended
slings it full just outside off and beats a forward prod
straighter delivery on middle and off and Tendulkar blocks it out
well bowled, hits a good length and forces him to defend again
strikes him on the pads as he shapes to work the ball to square leg, loud appeal after Tendulkar walks across, was probably hitting leg stump but enough doubt
slower ball outside off, the cutter, stays low and beats the bat
too fine, clips the pads and runs down toward fine leg, Malinga belts out an optimistic appeal
drifts down the pads and Yuvraj works it away to get off the mark
well bowled, slows the pace and flights it just outside off, gets some turn and Yuvraj defends to point
again lovely loop on the ball, dips and turns, defended down to gully
tempts him with an even wider ball but Yuvraj resists a shot
gets over a shorter ball in a hurry and forces it past point, good shot

slower ball drifts back in, Yuvraj stabs at it and misses out as it gets some extra bounce, he gets hit on the back leg and they all go up in appeal but there is no reaction from the umpire as he reckons it was doing too much, and there was some wood on it too
chases outside off and plays and misses once more
again opens the face and tries to steer but chops it down
ah, streaky shot, again forced to play at the ball and hits it in the air wide of backward point
much fuller, not much footwork as he squeezes a drives to short cover
slower ball, pitched up outside off, he opens the face and pushes and picks the gap at cover
back of a length on off stump, he starts to press forward but then holds back, turning the ball to midwicket, then stumbles out and gets sent back
tossed up on the stumps, he gets across early and paddles it off his sticks to bring up his half-century, his 17th against Sri Lanka
quicker ball, goes back and pokes it into the off side
good ball, no room on offer, aiming to drift it in, and Yuvraj defends
too short, he goes back and punches nicely into the gap at cover
nicely tossed up, pitches on middle and off and he strides forward
fuller, works it across the line, Randiv dives and stops it
spots the length and steers the ball past backward point, runs one but sends Tendulkar back as the sweeper does well in the deep
fuller in length, clipped nicely but to the man at midwicket
right up there on off stump and Tendulkar has to defend to cover
good upright seam, middle and off,  patiently patted back to Malinga
short of a length and he pushes it off the back foot to extra cover
digs in a short one to Yuvraj, who hops across and fends it off his ribs with one hand, the ball kisses his gloves and dies in front of a diving Sangakkara and evades him
gets across and works the ball with the spin past square leg
comes forward and punches the ball down the ground this time
slowly tossed up and it gets Yuvraj watchfully defending
and again, he tosses it up and gets him watchfully blocking
gets too much drift down the pads, Yuvraj sweeps around the corner, bit of a top edge but all is well ... or as those three idiots will say,  all izz well
tossed up, on middle and off, comes over it and defends
low full toss, slower one, surprises him and he pats it to cover
full down the pads, Tendulkar clips with the swing out to deep fine
ah, chases width outside off without footwork and gets beat
straighter ball, which he works out to deep square leg for two
short ball on the stumps, he hops up and pats it back
again on the stumps and he pushes it away
good shot, waits and waits and then dabs it very late and fine
too full on leg stump, caressed out to deep midwicket
googly, too fine, Yuvraj cannot connect on the nudge
spins away off a length and he runs it past backward point
good ball, turns away off a length and Tendulkar defends
floats up a fuller ball and brings him stretching a long way forward
down leg stump, skims the bat as Yuvraj hops up, comes in after pitching but too much doubt and a thick inside edge gets him off strike
straightens after pitching and Tendulkar defends it back
bit of extra bounce outside off but he gets over it and then adjusts with soft hands to run it down to third man for one more
flashes and misses outside off, too full and he didn't get across
forces him back in the crease, Yuvraj pats it back on the hop
slides down his hips, Sangakkara collects, wide called
short of a length, pushed back, Welegedara collects and feigns a shy
fulltoss, dips, becomes a yorker, and is bunted into the off side for one
another yorker-length delivery, played back to the bowler
tries a googly, it is a half-volley outside off, and driven straight to cover
on the middle stump this time, and played back to the bowler
another half-volley outside off, and driven down the ground
Tendulkar drives inside-out this time, it is short of driving length but controls it well
close to the body but he dabs it past two fielders square on the off
fuller and wider, Yuvraj drives off the front foot to cover
comes on after pitching, Yuvraj hurries to defend with an angled bat
slow bouncer, surprises him, he takes his eyes off it and ducks

nicked and gone! Welegedara smartly follows the bouncer with a fuller and wider ball which lures Yuvraj into a terrible drive away from the body, the lack of coordination does for him and Sangakkara takes the outside edge
brings him forward first ball, running the ball down to third man
tossed up on middle and leg, worked with the turn to midwicket
gets a stride in and works the wrists, driving down the ground
floated up out the back of the hand, Tendulkar pushes it back
quicker ball, some turn, Tendulkar pushes at the googly and gets an inside edge which negates the loud appeal from bowler and keeper
floats up another googly which Karthik works off his pads
fuller ball, googly again, Karthik stabs at it and gets an inside edge just wide of the man at short leg
opens the face and steers the ball to third man for a single
pitches on a length and Tendulkar pushes the ball to cover
goes back, stands tall, and forces a shorter ball towards point
punches a fuller ball toward extra cover and gets a single
stands there and just allows the ball come on, then dabs it past Sangakkara, played very fine and smartly
full on middle and leg, Karthik defends resolutely and gets an inside edge to short fine leg, he stands there in his pose and Tendulkar sets off, so then Karthik has to wake up and scamper across
loopy full toss smacked over midwicket out to where Kandamby makes a meal of a fielding effort and allows four, he ran across to his right but then clasped at the ball
leans into a drive and pushes it to cover
another cheeky dab, opens the face and plays it very well
and again, hangs back, sees if there's turn, there is a bit and he dabs it
slower ball, googly, pushes it off the front foot to mid-off
fuller ball, on the stumps, defended watchfully
walks across and clips the full ball between two fielders, cracking shot
hangs on the back foot and then pushes a shorter ball to cover
again anticipates the length and pushes the ball off the back foot to cover
aims for a yorker outside off, Tendulkar easily squeezes it to third man
good ball, a slinging yorker on middle and off, jammed out in time
too full for a yorker, no footwork from Karthik who pushes for it and loses a hand off the bat, but safely hit in the air wide of Malinga
goes back and dabs the ball down wide of backward point
stands back, sees the length, squirts it between cover and point
fuller ball, gets over it and drives past Mendis to long-on
delicately done, spots the wrong 'un down the pads, walks across, and gets bat on ball to raise India's 200
tossed up outside off and gets him defending to cover
quicker ball but another wrong 'un down the leg side, Tendulkar goes for his vertical sweep but the ball flies off his arm, not sure why the umpire called wide
well played, eases forward and smashes the ball through extra cover
onto the front foot, defending to cover
great yorker, somehow misses, Karthik digging it out
cannot pull off the yorker this time but deceives Karthik with a full toss, he chips it over mid-on
goes full again, this time Karthik drives and edges down to third man
back of a length and squirted into the off side nicely
bouncer, he flinches as it goes over his left shoulder
tossed up, some turn, he opens the face and dabs it fine, ball hits pad first but outside the line
spins down this time and works it fine
tossed up, Karthik works it across the line past midwicket
slowly tossed up and he drives to deep extra cover
tossed up on a length, he gets forward and pushes into the covers
sweeps from outside off stump with the turn and hits it hard, getting Kulasekara running across from fine leg, and that is the 50-run stand
full outside leg stump, flicks the pads and runs to deep fine leg
good ball, aims for the yorker, gets some swing, Tendulkar walks across and gets an inside edge
good placement from Tendulkar, who premeditates the full ball and walks across to flick it wide of deep fine leg for four

dangerous, walks right across his stumps and tries to paddle it, the ball is not as full and strikes him on the back leg, a very confident appeal but enough doubt in the mind because he was on the hop
short of a length and Karthik stands tall to keep the ball at his feet
swing there, another good yorker, Karthik clears his front leg and digs it out
tossed up, Tendulkar sweeps from outside off stump with the turn, misses and survives marginally because he was hit slightly outside the line
dances out and hits it on the bounce to the man down at long-on
slower ball, spins in, he defends and the ball gets tangled in his pad
pushes it through just outside the line of impact, Karthik stabs at it and gets an inside edge
maximum! Dances out, collects on the full, and dumps it over long-on
pitches outside leg and he turns it to midwicket
well there's one of them, as he again walks across early and clips an inside edge off a full ball down the pads, beating a diving Sangakkara
goes full outside off, he stands there and opens the face, steering the ball out to third man
loud shot as Karthik gets an inside edge, no chance
full down the pads, misses everything and India lead the series!
